author: Irishexaminer.com (digitaldesk@irishexaminer.com)
title: Hit-Boy enters Grammys with producer nod while helping newly freed father
text:
Hit-Boy will have his father beside him on the Grammy red carpet for the first time at the awards ceremony on February 4.
For three decades, the super producerâ€™s father was in and out of prison, with his recent stint lasting nine years until his release several months ago.
With his fatherâ€™s newfound freedom, Hit-Boy â€“ who has worked with music heavyweights from Jay-Z, Nas and Kayne West â€“ is focused on strengthening their father-son bond while navigating the music industry together.
Hit-Boy has the Grammys and a producer of the year, non-classical nomination in his sights.
He has had three songs involving Brent Faiyaz, Blxst and The Alchemist.
He also produced three Nas albums, including Kingâ€™s Disease III, which is up for best rap album; one with Musiq Soulchild; and his two Surf Or Down albums, which featured the producer as a rapper and his father on several tracks under the stage name Big Hit.
When Hit-Boy first heard about being a nominee again, he felt an instant â€œwave of emotionsâ€.
He was one of the most productive producers this past year compared to others in his category â€“ which includes Jack Antonoff, Metro Boomin, Dernst â€œDâ€™Mileâ€ Emile II and Daniel Nigro.
â€œI literally broke down in tears,â€ said Hit-Boy, a three-time Grammy winner through Jay-Z and Kanye Westâ€™s â€¦ In Paris, Nipsey Hussleâ€™s Racks In The Middle and Nasâ€™s album King Disease.
He has worked with top performers including Beyonce, Mary J Blige, Drake, Mariah Carey, Ariana Grande and Jennifer Lopez.
But for Hit-Boy, this past year has been different.
â€œWhen I really look back and had that moment to reflect, I was like, â€˜Wow, I didnâ€™t have the biggest artists in the world thatâ€™s going to stream,â€ he said.
â€œThey are going to make it work. I was working with artists that donâ€™t have million-dollar budgets behind them.â€
Throughout the year, Hit-Boy said he worked mostly with Nas and his father, Big Hit, who recorded his lyrics for the intro on Surf Or Down Vol 1 while incarcerated.
After his fatherâ€™s release, Hit-Boy took him directly to the studio â€” where they both laid down tracks.
This month, Big Hit, 52, released his debut album The Truth Is In My Eyes, which features Snoop Dogg, Benny The Butcher, Musiq Soulchild, Dom Kennedy, The Alchemist and Mozzy.
He said it was tough being away from his son and watching his success from afar.
â€œIt was torture just knowing the kind of impact I couldâ€™ve had and what I missed in his life,â€ said the rapper, who was arrested during a traffic stop in Illinois in 2014.
He had an outstanding warrant, which stemmed from a hit-and-run in Los Angeles which left several people injured.
At the time, Hit-Boy said his father was gaining positive momentum and made good impressions with the likes of Jay-Z and 50 Cent before his arrest, which the producer called devastating.
â€œI thought about how I could have shaped and moulded him,â€ Big Hit said.
â€œBeing a wonderful addition. Instead of bringing him down, I could have tightened him up. But I still did my best in the situation where I was at. But weâ€™re pushing full speed ahead. Weâ€™re bridging that gap.â€
Since Big Hitâ€™s release, Hit-Boy has been focused on keeping his father busy and spending time with him almost daily while creating an independent lane for their careers.
The producer said he has funded â€œevery single thing since he touched downâ€.
â€œItâ€™s bigger than just doing the music,â€ Hit-Boy said.
â€œIâ€™m creating that network, helping them to have a workflow. Iâ€™m spending money on these marketing plans. Iâ€™m coming with all the best ideas I can. Every day is an adventure. My whole life, heâ€™s got out and went back in. Stressed out that he might do something to jeopardise it again.
â€œItâ€™s part of that brainwork where you just got to hold it down and financially. I wanted to build, put together pieces that would bring people completely into his world.â€
Hit-Boy said several labels have offered Big Hit deals but they turned them down.
The producer said they will be better off on their own for now.
â€œThey wanted to put some cool money in his pocket,â€ Hit-Boy said.
â€œBut Iâ€™ve been in the game since I was 19. He got locked up at 19 until he was in his 30s. Now, Iâ€™m in my 30s and Iâ€™m locked up in the industry, because Iâ€™m still to this day in a bad publishing deal with Universal Music Publishing Group.
â€œI would feel so crazy to let my dad get caught up with these same systems, the same ways and ideologies that Iâ€™ve been fed since I was a kid. I just canâ€™t go for it.â€
Hit-Boy, 36, and his team decided against releasing Big Hitâ€™s new album on digital stream platforms.
He wants people to buy directly from them, which according to his team has so far worked out.
â€œWe got physical CDs. Weâ€™re not going to do any DSPs, no streaming,â€ the producer said.
â€œIâ€™ve been seeing a lot of people complain about that. Snoop just went on a platform and talked about how he got a billion streams, but only earned about 40,000 or 45,000 dollars.
â€œI feel like if we sell 10,000 CDs, weâ€™re going to blow that out the water. Weâ€™re going to start small. We donâ€™t need to have a billion streams, because that might only equate to 10,000. Weâ€™re going to let people buy the music directly from us.â€
Hit-Boy said he and his father are making music, doing business together like he always wanted.
If he could win a Grammy with his father, mother and young son in attendance, it would mean the world to him.
â€œEvery time I won a Grammy, he was locked up,â€ he said.
â€œThat would be dope to win. Iâ€™m going to speak it into existence.â€

title: AlgodÃ£o de laboratÃ³rio ganha impulso
text:
A start-up Galy, que cultiva algodÃ£o a partir de cÃ©lulas em laboratÃ³rio, poupando recursos ao nÃ­vel da Ã¡gua, solo e energia, recebeu um novo impulso com o investimento da Inditex.
Para produzir algodÃ£o, a Galy recolhe amostras de uma planta e cultiva as suas cÃ©lulas, que crescem num bio-reator ou em vasos de fermentaÃ§Ã£o num processo de cultura de cÃ©lulas semelhante ao que acontece com a cerveja. O produto final Ã© seco e recolhido, minimizando a utilizaÃ§Ã£o de solo, Ã¡gua e energia, destaca a start-up. Â«Em vez de cultivar a planta todo, vamos diretamente da cÃ©lula para a fibraÂ», indicou Luciano Bueno, CEO e cofundador da empresa, Ã 
Forbes, em 2020, apÃ³s a Galy ter recebido o prÃ©mio Global Change Awards da H&M Foundation.
Â«O mÃ©todo Ã© 10 vezes mais rÃ¡pido e usa menos de 80% de Ã¡gua e solo, emitindo apenas uma fraÃ§Ã£o de gases com efeito de estufa em comparaÃ§Ã£o com o algodÃ£o convencional. O preÃ§o serÃ¡ o mesmo do algodÃ£o de elevada qualidade que se pratica atualmente no mercadoÂ», explicou a start-up na altura. AlÃ©m disso, Â«pode ser cultivado em qualquer lugarÂ», uma vez que nÃ£o estÃ¡ dependente das condiÃ§Ãµes meteorolÃ³gicas ou do solo.
A Inditex anunciou na Ãºltima assembleia de acionistas, que teve lugar a 9 de julho, a entrada no capital da Galy, integrada na estratÃ©gia de sustentabilidade da retalhista espanhola. O investimento, cujo valor nÃ£o foi revelado pelo CEO da retalhista espanhola, Ã“scar GarcÃ­a Maceiras, deve contribuir para a
Inditex atingir o objetivo de ter 40% das suas fibras provenientes de reciclagem convencional e 25% de materiais de nova geraÃ§Ã£o atÃ© ao fim desta dÃ©cada. Â«A transformaÃ§Ã£o sustentÃ¡vel do nosso sector nÃ£o Ã© possÃ­vel sem inovaÃ§Ã£o e a inovaÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o Ã© possÃ­vel sem colaboraÃ§Ã£oÂ», afirmou o CEO, que deu conta de outros acordos do gÃ©nero, como os assinados recentemente com a Ambercycle e a Circ.
No ano passado, a Galy fez tambÃ©m uma parceria com a japonesa Suzuran Medical, para fornecer milhares de toneladas da fibra â€“ batizada Literally Cotton â€“ para aplicaÃ§Ã£o em artigos cosmÃ©ticos e mÃ©dicos, como gaze, como parte de um acordo de 50 milhÃµes de dÃ³lares.
Â«Acreditamos que a introduÃ§Ã£o desta tecnologia no mercado vai contribuir para resolver os problemas do impacto no clima e do trabalho infantil causado pelo cultivo de algodÃ£o. Tem tambÃ©m um enorme potencial do ponto de vista do negÃ³cio e vemos como sendo uma inovaÃ§Ã£o que vai mudar o conceito da produÃ§Ã£o de algodÃ£oÂ», resume Yasuhiro Kunieda, presidente da Suzuran Medical.
Fundada em 2019 por Luciano Bueno nos EUA e com investidores como Sam Altman, CEO da OpenAI, a Galy, que em 2021 recebeu o prÃ©mio de inovaÃ§Ã£o do LVMH na categoria de sustentabilidade, tem atualmente um escritÃ³rio em SÃ£o Paulo, no Brasil e mais de 50 funcionÃ¡rios.

title: Best Crypto to Buy Now December 28
text:
Best Crypto to Buy Now December 28 â€“ Bitcoin SV, Aave, Arbitrum
Select cryptocurrencies are exhibiting bullish behavior to close out the year, making them potentially among the best cryptos to buy nowâ€“with Bitcoin SV rallying nearly 80%, Aave surging alongside Ethereum, and Arbitrumâ€™s price increasing on the heels of layer 2 optimism.
Meanwhile, ongoing crypto presales like Sponge V2 and Meme Kombat are also attracting investor attention.
Best Crypto to Buy Now in the News
Bitcoin SVâ€™s (BSV) price has seen a notable increase, with a 53.74% rise yesterday to $76.78 and an additional 16.46% surge today to $89.30.
This upward trend has sparked discussions on the sustainability of its rapid growth.
Technical indicators suggest that while the upward movement is strong, the current conditions may be overextended.
Upbitâ€™s share of trading volume has been pivotal for BSVâ€™s performance, but reliance on this volume raises questions about the rallyâ€™s future.
The decentralized finance token Aave is currently priced around $117.41,
with whale activities contributing to its recent price action. A notable withdrawal of AAVE tokens from Binance by a large investor indicates a positive sentiment towards the asset.
Furthermore, Aaveâ€™s value has surged alongside Ethereum, which recently reached $2,400.
The high correlation coefficient of 0.92 between ETH and AAVE prices suggests that Aaveâ€™s future could be closely tied to
Ethereumâ€™s market movements.
Arbitrum, a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, has seen a 20% increase in value in just 24 hours, a rise that aligns with the growing interest in
layer 2 technologies.
The Arbitrum ecosystem has expanded, with a 50% growth in developer headcount year-over-year.
Such growth underscores the platformâ€™s attractiveness and potential for further adoption.
I've posted some updates on
[$ARB].
Retest at $0.98 did work, continuation towards $1.35 as well and even further.
Some beautiful S/R flips, I think $1.40-1.45 should hold and we can continue to $2.
[pic.twitter.com/wIFEg26zq8]
â€” MichaÃ«l van de Poppe (@CryptoMichNL)
[December 28, 2023]
Analysts like Michael van de Poppe have a positive outlook for ARB, with expectations of a bullish continuation that could see the token approach the $2 mark.
Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterinâ€™s commendation for Arbitrum as a stage 1 roll-up adds to the platformâ€™s credibility and may influence its market performance.
With these established tokens making headlines, the crypto presales market is not far behind.
Projects like Sponge V2 and Meme Kombat are stepping into the spotlight, offering Bitcoin alternatives worth checking.
These early-stage projects are creating a buzz with their unique propositions and are being closely watched by investors considering diversifying their cryptocurrency portfolios.
As the year draws to a close, these cryptocurrencies and crypto presales demonstrate the
broad selection of Bitcoin alternatives in the cryptocurrency market.
Bitcoin SV, Aave, and Arbitrum have solidified their positions as some of the best crypto to buy now, with each demonstrating unique factors that appeal to different segments of investors.
Meanwhile, presales like Sponge V2 and Meme Kombat present opportunities for those looking to get in on the ground floor of promising new crypto ventures.
BSV Price Rockets 16.46%: Resistance and Support Levels to Watch
The Bitcoin SV (BSV) price has seen an astounding rally over the past two days, with the cryptocurrency currently up by nearly 80%.
This intense surge comes amidst rising trading volumes from major South Korean cryptocurrency exchange Upbit.
However, with the spike in volume primarily originating from this singular exchange, BSVâ€™s rally could lose momentum if conviction fades.
Examining the key BSV price technical indicators paints a mixed picture.
The 20-day EMA stands at $55.79 while the 50-day EMA sits at $51.15, with the BSV price well above both at $89.30.
Typically, a price above its short and long-term EMAs signals bullish momentum.
Meanwhile, the
relative strength index (RSI) has shot up to 87.27 from 83.05 yesterday.
This shows BSV is heavily overbought, signaling the price could be due for a pullback.
The MACD histogram sits at 3.48, a sizable increase from yesterdayâ€™s 1.69.
The growing positive value indicates a strengthening bullish sentiment behind the BSV price.
With BSV stabilizing north of $80, technical indicators remain conflicted.
While overbought RSI hints at downside potential, surging volume and MACD highlight raging bullish momentum.
Trading within defined risk limits while awaiting confirmation may be wise.
A break past immediate resistance between $98.85 and $102.10 could signal an extended upswing.
Meanwhile, support at the Fib 0.236 and 0.382 levels of $84.89 and $77.38 could cushion any declines.
The near-term direction will likely hinge on whether or not conviction holds as the BSV price ventures into overbought territory.
AAVE Price Struggles to Hold Gains: Fib 0.236 Level as Immediate Resistance
The AAVE price has seen bullish momentum for the past few days, with the cryptocurrency up over 4% so far today.
AAVE is attempting to break out past key resistance levels after setting a new year-to-date high of $129.88 earlier today.
However, the AAVE price has struggled to retain its gains and is currently trading below the Fib 0.236 level of $119.79.
This area could act as immediate resistance if AAVE closes below this level.
Examining key technical indicators shows there are mixed signals for AAVEâ€™s price.
The 20-day EMA stands at $102.88, above the 50-day EMA of $97.18, which is typically seen as a bullish sign.
However, the closeness of these EMAs indicates high volatility and uncertainty for the AAVE price.
The RSI is currently at 71.35, up from yesterdayâ€™s 66.87 and approaching overbought territory. This suggests upward momentum is building.
Meanwhile, the MACD histogram sits at 1.25, an increase over yesterdayâ€™s 0.52. The growing positive value points to strengthening bullish sentiment.
With the AAVE price stabilizing above crucial support levels, indicators remain balanced between further upside and potential pullback.
Trading within defined risk limits while awaiting confirmation of a breakout past resistance at $119.79 or support at the Fib 0.5 level of $108.53 may be prudent.
A decisive close above the $120 resistance or a drop below the $108 support zone could set the trend for the AAVE price over the coming days. Careful risk management is key amidst the mixed signals.
ARB Struggles to Extend Higher: Potential Near-Term Weakness Ahead
The Arbitrum (ARB) price saw increased volatility yesterday after breaking out from a period of consolidation and posting gains of 13.51%.
However, despite setting a new multi-month high earlier today, ARB is struggling to extend higher so far today, pointing to potential near-term weakness.
Currently trading around $1.50, the ARB price is down 0.44% so far today. This marks a pullback after ARB hit a multi-month high of $1.6691 earlier in the session.
With the cryptocurrency facing resistance confluent with key Fib levels, ARB appears set for a potential correction.
Looking at technical indicators, the 20-day EMA for ARB stands at $1.2682, above the 50-day EMA at $1.1568.
This bullish crossover shows upside momentum in the short term. However, ARB trading back below the 20-day EMA could signal waning momentum.
The RSI for ARB is currently reading 68.41, down slightly from 69 yesterday.
This shows bullish momentum slowing despite remaining in overbought territory above 70.
The fading RSI highlights the potential for a pullback after the recent surge.
At the same time, the MACD histogram sits at 0.0308, up from 0.0288 yesterday.
The histogram growing more positive indicates bullish momentum remains intact.
However, a histogram rollover could foreshadow an ARB price drop.
With the ARB price around $1.50, the cryptocurrency is testing resistance between $1.5740 and $1.6085.
This area aligns with the Fib -0.382 level at $1.5861. A failure here signals potential downside ahead.
On support, ARB shows the previous resistance zone of $1.4188 to $1.4637 in focus.
This area could catch a pullback after flipping to support.
Below that, the Fib 0.382 and 0.236 levels around $1.35 mark the next key support zone.
Analyzing volume and market cap provides added context. ARB saw its market cap climb to $321 million, up from $308 million yesterday.
However, 24-hour trading volume fell to just $19 million. The diverging metrics highlight uncertainty.
Overall, after spiking to multi-month highs, the ARB price appears vulnerable to a pullback as bullish momentum slows.
The test of resistance confluent with extended Fib levels underscores risks. Against this backdrop, trading within defined risk limits seems prudent.
A decisive break above $1.60 resistance or a drop below $1.35 support could set the stage for the next major trending move.
In the near term, ranging could persist for ARB while awaiting the next catalyst.
While major cryptocurrencies grapple with near-term directional uncertainty, speculative crypto presales offer exposure to new ecosystems.
Sponge V2 and Meme Kombat exemplify this, merging memes and gaming with cryptocurrencies.
Navigating New Avenues in Cryptocurrency: A Look at Proming Bitcoin Alternatives
The cryptocurrency market, traditionally anchored by
Bitcoin, is witnessing a growing interest in developing blockchain projects.
This trend is a departure from the usual focus on
established market leaders, signaling a strategic shift among investors.
These new projects, like Sponge V2 and Meme Kombat, are increasingly catching the eye of savvy investors.
Their potential for growth in the early stages is a key factor in their rising popularity.
This shift indicates a move towards a more diversified investment approach, focusing on developmental cryptocurrencies rather than mainstream ones.
Investing in these developing crypto ventures, particularly through presale opportunities, presents a unique chance for early involvement in their growth trajectory.
For those looking to diversify their cryptocurrency portfolios, paying attention to these Bitcoin alternatives could be a wise decision.
The concept of the â€˜best crypto to buy nowâ€™ is evolving. Itâ€™s no longer just about the most popular names in the market.
Bitcoin alternatives, often lesser-known but with substantial growth potential, are becoming increasingly relevant.
Sponge Token Success Sparks Excitement for Sponge V2 Presale: Is It the Best Crypto to Buy Now?
The meme coin Sponge (SPONGE) is launching a presale for its second version, Sponge V2 (SPONGEV2), coming on the heels of the success of the original meme coin in May.
The first Sponge Token saw substantial gains during the recent memecoin boom, reaching a peak market capitalization of nearly $100 million.
Now, Sponge V2 seeks to build on that momentum with an upgraded meme coin.

[$SPONGE]tokens from the V1 staking contract and stake them in our V2 smart contract. ğŸ™Œ

[December 28, 2023] According to the Sponge V2 website, the new token will introduce staking rewards and a play-to-earn game.
Sponge V2 will be launching as an ERC-20 token on the
Ethereum blockchain through a bridging method the team calls â€œstake-to-bridge.â€
Holders of the original Sponge Token can stake their tokens to earn Sponge V2 tokens when they launch.
Sponge V1 tokens staked will be locked permanently in the V2 staking pool and accumulate V2 tokens over four years.
The Sponge V2 presale seeks to further capitalize on the meme coin hype and offer staking rewards of up to 613% APY to draw in buyers.
T
he project said on social media that the presale seeks to â€œabsorb liquidity and establish dominance in the crypto space.â€
Sponge V2 has allocated 26.93% of the token supply for bridging from V1, 43.09% for staking rewards, and 10% to centralized exchange liquidity.
The tokenomics also include allocations for marketing, game development, and play-to-earn rewards.
The original Sponge Token gained traction during the recent surge of interest in meme coins.
Now, the team behind that project is leveraging its community and marketing playbook to try and replicate the success with Sponge V2.
While meme coins remain highly speculative assets, the Sponge ecosystem has already proven it can attract substantial hype.
The Sponge V2 presale offers an opportunity for those interested in the meme coin space to get in early before the new token launches.
Meme Kombat: The Best Crypto to Buy Now for Memes and Crypto Gaming Enthusiasts
Riding the momentum of the meme coin phenomenon, a cryptocurrency startup named Meme Kombat seeks to blend memes and play-to-earn gaming.
The platformâ€™s MK token presale has already exceeded $5 million in contributions.
We hit $5 million raised in the

Congrats fighters!

The core of Meme Kombat is its
upcoming crypto gaming platform enabling users to battle popular meme characters. Powered by artificial intelligence and blockchain technology, the outcomes of these PvP clashes will be randomly determined.
Players can stake Meme Kombat tokens and bet on match results, earning MK token rewards when their selected meme fighter wins.
With its interactive gameplay and community focus, Meme Kombat wants to offer something new compared to typical meme coins.
The game will feature fan-favorite memes like
SpongeBob, Wojak, and Shiba Inu as playable characters to attract engagement.
Leading the project are founder Matt Whiteman and his public-facing development team.
Whitemanâ€™s credentials are viewable on LinkedIn, underscoring Meme Kombatâ€™s commitment to transparency.
Meme Kombatâ€™s tokenomics allocate 50% of tokens to presale participants, 30% to staking rewards, 10% to liquidity pools, and 10% to community initiatives.
This distribution intends to incentivize presale buyers to actively participate post-launch by gaming and staking their MK tokens.
While risky like any crypto investment, Meme Kombat provides a unique value proposition through its creative fusion of memes and play-to-earn gaming.
The presaleâ€™s strong momentum highlights enthusiastic demand for Meme Kombatâ€™s interactive platform.
As the token sale enters its final stages, the closing period often gives buyers the optimal window to acquire tokens before exchange listings.

author: Shraddha Sharma
title: Bitcoin: VanEck Records Fund Growth, Foresees Strong 2024
text: Asset manager VanEck has a bullish outlook for Bitcoin and the broader crypto market in 2024. The investment firm described Bitcoin as the â€œscreaming buyâ€ for the upcoming year as its fund recorded growth. The comments come as the firmâ€™s VanEck Digital Transformation ETF (DAPP) surpassed $100 million in assets under management (AUM), with VanEckâ€™s global crypto-linked assets nearing $1 billion. 2024: A Promising Year Matthew Sigel, Head of Digital Assets Research at VanEck, noted DAPPâ€™s impressive 2023 performance with over 300% gains. Sigel said that it was driven by key players like Coinbase and Bitcoin miners. Sigel anticipates 2024 to be another robust year, especially if Bitcoin reaches new highs, aided by the Bitcoin halving event, a more relaxed stance from the U.S. Federal Reserve, and continued adoption of crypto in emerging markets. The fund manager highlights that [Coinbase](https://coingape.com/coinbase-and-top-crypto-companies-increase-us-political-donations/), a significant component of DAPP, has shown sustainable market share growth. Notably, the exchange recently announced a 10x leverage cap on perpetual futures for major cryptocurrencies, aiming to enhance market stability. The Nasdaq-listed exchange is also actively involved in Washington. Recently, it refuted allegations by Senator Elizabeth Warren regarding employing a â€œ [revolving door](https://coingape.com/coinbase-counters-senator-warrens-revolving-door-allegation/)â€ tactic with former legislators to bypass regulatory measures. Recommended Articles Bitcoin remains the market star Jan van Eck, CEO of VanEck, highlighted crypto as the investment marketâ€™s most exciting segment. VanEck, one of the first few to apply for a Bitcoin-related ETF, predicts a breakout year for Bitcoin and crypto in 2024. The executive also underlined that the introduction of a spot ETF in the U.S. is among the top catalysts for this surge. In the [past](https://twitter.com/vaneck_us/status/1732811847076573388?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1732811896191909895%7Ctwgr%5Eced982beac5d8f1a7fb8e514b5e29cf74e49fc89%7Ctwcon%5Es2_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hindustantimes.com%2Ftrending%2F2024-crypto-predictions-heres-what-experts-are-saying-101703698843376.html), VanEck made a prediction about 2024 that included the onset of the U.S. recession alongside the launch of the first spot Bitcoin ETF, potentially attracting over $2.4 billion in investments in Q1 2024. The firm also foresees minimal disruption from Aprilâ€™s halving event. Meanwhile, VanEck predicts an all-time high for Bitcoin in Q4 2024, possibly driven by political events and regulatory changes post the U.S. presidential election. author: Rogelio Loredo
title: Â¡SeÃ±orita XÃ³chitl!: AsÃ­ recibiÃ³ XÃ³chitl GÃ¡lvez un ramo de flores buchÃ³n de â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™
text:
La Ãºltima â€˜maÃ±aneraâ€™ de XÃ³chitl GÃ¡lvez t uvo una gran sorpresa (literalmente): â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™ , uno de los creadores de TikTok mÃ¡s populares, llegÃ³ a la Conferencia de la Verdad de la candidata a la presidencia con un ramo de flores â€œbuchÃ³nâ€ .
Al finalizar la conferencia de este 29 de febrero , se escuchÃ³ a un hombre gritar â€œÂ¡seÃ±orita XÃ³chitl, seÃ±orita XÃ³chitl, le manda unas flores â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™!â€.
Lee tambiÃ©n: Un cuarto de guerra albiazul defiende la â€œcandidatura ciudadanaâ€ de XÃ³chitl GÃ¡lvez
Luego de escuchar la misteriosa voz, la candidata de la coaliciÃ³n Fuerza y CorazÃ³n por MÃ©xico , preguntÃ³ que quiÃ©n era â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™ , y luego de unas risas nerviosas, un hombre se acercÃ³ al podio para entregarle el enorme ramo de flores.
XÃ³chitl GÃ¡lvez , sorprendida por el gesto, preguntÃ³ nuevamente que quiÃ©n era â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™, a lo que el hombre vestido con jeans, botas y sombrero le respondiÃ³ que se trataba de â€œEl PatrÃ³n de patronesâ€, quien le mandÃ³ a decir â€œque cuenta con el apoyo de todos los â€˜XÃ³chitlovers'â€.
DespuÃ©s de hacer memoria, la candidata por el PAN, PRI y PRD, le dijo â€œah, que tÃº eres el de TikTokâ€ y Ã©l le respondiÃ³ que asÃ­ era y por Ãºltimo le deseÃ³ que tenga una campaÃ±a â€œmuy chingonaâ€ y que â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™ le mandaba a decir que ella es â€œuna persona muy valiente y muy luchonaâ€.
AquÃ­ puedes ver el video del momento:
Â¿QuiÃ©n es â€˜El PatrÃ³n? â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™ se trata de un negocio de flores que se volviÃ³ viral en TikTok por el trato que le da a sus clientes.
Esta florerÃ­a ofrece â€œramos buchonesâ€ que van de cien a 500 rosas, las cuales son entregadas personalmente por un hombre disfrazado de â€œbuchÃ³nâ€ -tal y como el que llegÃ³ a la Conferencia de la Verdad-, acompaÃ±ado de una canciÃ³n elegida por los clientes y una dedicatoria especial que dice â€œse las manda â€˜El PatrÃ³nâ€™.
Pero todo esto es capturado en video para mostrar la reacciÃ³n de las personas que reciben sus ramos, que es precisamente por lo que se ha vuelto viral este negocio en TikTok , el cual cuenta con mÃ¡s de 3 millones 200 mil seguidores y mÃ¡s de 88 millones de likes.

author: Collin Haalboom
title: Tom Brady Names Bucs as Top 5 NFL Team
text: Tom Brady Names Bucs as Top 5 NFL Team 7-time Super Bowl champion turned [broadcaster](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/tampa-bay-buccaneers-news/bucs-games-tom-brady-fox-2024-schedule) Tom BradyÃ¢â‚¬â€ and the last QB to hoist the Lombardi Trophy as a member of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers Ã¢â‚¬â€ recently did a segment for FOX where he unveiled his Power Rankings of the top 5 teams in the NFL heading into Week 3. Although Brady's broadcasting skills have received mixed reviews, his knowledge of the NFL, and more specifically, what makes a great team, cannot be disputed. Not only did Brady list the [Bucs ](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/tampa-bay-buccaneers-still-need-to-fix-their-running-game)as one of the five best teams in the NFL right now, but he took it a step further and listed them as one of his top 3. [READ MORE: Bucs Doing 'Great Job' Rebuilding Super Bowl Contender](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/tampa-bay-buccaneers-doing-great-job-rebuilding-super-bowl-contender) Here's what Brady had to say about his former team. "The Tampa Bay Buccaneers. They got revenge from their playoff loss last year in Week 2 vs. the Lions. They played a great game. Defense was the definition of bend don't break. The Lions were one of seven in the red zone. They picked off Goff twice and they played great defense when it mattered most." Brady believes, at least based on what the [Bucs](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/tampa-bay-buccaneers-deemed-contenders-among-nfl-undefeated-teams) have put on tape so far this season, that only the Kansas City Chiefs and Buffalo Bills are better. Some may suggest Brady is showing his bias as a former Buccaneer, but I don't see the New England Patriots Ã¢â‚¬â€ who dominated the Cincinnati Bengals in Week 1 Ã¢â‚¬â€ on this list. [READ MORE: Bucs Once Again Set To Be Without Offensive Starter](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/tampa-bay-buccaneers-once-again-set-to-be-without-offensive-starter-luke-goedeke) Stick withÃ‚ [BucsGameday](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/)Ã‚ for more coverage of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers throughout the 2024 season. Follow BucsGameday onÃ‚ More Tampa Bay Buccaneers News Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã‚ [Bucs RB Set to Face Former Oregon Teammate in Broncos QB Bo Nix](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/positive-injury-update-for-tampa-bay-buccaneers-lead-running-back-rachaad-white) Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã‚ [Panthers Legend Dubs Baker Mayfield Run 'Smartest Play'](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/panthers-legend-dubs-tampa-bay-buccaneers-qb-baker-mayfield-run-smartest-play) Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã‚ [Bucs Climb in Week 2 Power Rankings Roundup](https://www.si.com/nfl/buccaneers/news/tampa-bay-buccaneers-climb-in-week-2-power-rankings-roundup)

author: Dominic Sanders
title: Revolutionizing Lawn Care: Verde.Ai Launches R-1000 Mower
text: Revolutionizing Lawn Care: Verde.Ai Launches R-1000 Mower [Dominic Sanders](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79424)Updated: 10-17-2024 05:28 PM Introducing the R-1000: A Major Innovation in Lawn Care Verde.Ai, an innovative company led by women, has recently unveiled an extraordinary product that redefines the experience of lawn maintenance. The R-1000 robotic lawn mower is at the forefront of this transformation, designed specifically to cater to the needs of modern homeowners. By fusing technology with environmentally conscious practices, Verde.Ai aims to make lawn care efficient and sustainable. High-Tech Features of the R-1000 The R-1000 doesnâ€™t just follow traditional mowing methods. Its standout feature is the integration of GEODNET RTK technology, which eliminates the need for challenging perimeter wiring. This advanced solution allows for exceptionally precise mowing, ensuring that every inch of the lawn gets the care it deserves. With integrated 4G and WiFi connectivity, the mower ensures homeowners can manage their lawn care effectively, even when they're away from home. Enhancing Lawn Care with AI The incorporation of artificial intelligence enhances the R-1000â€™s functionality. This intelligent system can detect dry patches on the lawn, allowing the mower to optimize water usage. By addressing specific needs, the R-1000 not only promotes a healthier lawn but also conserves precious resources, reflecting Verde.Ai's commitment to sustainability. Meet the Vision Behind Verde.Ai Melissa Nguyen, the founder and CEO of Verde.Ai, expresses her excitement about the company's mission. "Our goal is to present lawn care that's both smarter and greener, driven by innovative technology,â€ she asserts. With the launch of the R-1000, Verde.Ai is making significant strides in delivering an effortless lawn care solution to homeowners. Design and Performance The R-1000 features adjustable cutting heights ranging from 0.8 inches to 2.5 inches, allowing homeowners to customize their mowing experience according to their preferences. With a retail price of $1295, the R-1000 represents a valuable investment in lawn care technology. Additionally, its whisper-quiet, zero-emission operation makes it environmentally friendly, further aligning with the values of sustainability and innovation. Discover More About Verde.Ai Founded by a visionary leader, Verde.Ai stands at the cusp of revolutionizing the way residential lawns are maintained. Through its advanced robotic solutionsâ€”like the R-1000â€”this startup is setting new standards for environmentally friendly lawn care. By providing precise mowing capabilities without the need for extraneous hardware, Verde.Ai is redefining urban landscaping. Frequently Asked Questions What is the R-1000 and what does it offer? The R-1000 is a robotic lawn mower that integrates advanced GEODNET RTK technology, 4G connectivity, and artificial intelligence, providing precise and effective lawn care. How does GEODNET RTK technology enhance mowing? GEODNET RTK technology eliminates the need for perimeter wires, allowing the mower to operate accurately and efficiently across the lawn for a perfectly maintained space. Can the R-1000 adjust its cutting height? Yes, the R-1000 allows users to adjust the cutting height from 0.8 inches to 2.5 inches for a customizable mowing experience. What is the price of the R-1000? The R-1000 is available for a retail price of $1295, making it a competitive option in robotic lawn care solutions. Where can I find more information about Verde.Ai? To learn more about Verde.Ai and their innovative products, visit their official website at www.verde.ai. title: â€œTu es un fardeau pour la sociÃ©tÃ©, meursâ€ : lâ€™IA Gemini devient folle et insulte violemment un utilisateur
text:
Une conversation en apparence banale avec le chatbot Gemini de Google a mal tournÃ©e. L'IA s'est mise Ã  insulter l'internaute, allant jusqu'Ã  lui demander de mourir tant il est inutile.
CrÃ©dits : 123RF Peu importe que vous posiez une question Ã  ChatGPT ou Gemini , les chatbots basÃ©s sur l' intelligence artificielle vous rÃ©pondront toujours poliment. Ã€ moins que vous leur demandiez spÃ©cifiquement de ne pas le faire, et encore. Que l'IA adopte par dÃ©faut un comportement courtois est tout Ã  fait logique au fond. Personne n'a envie de se faire insulter quand il veut seulement de l'aide pour rÃ©diger un mail professionnel important.
Il peut arriver qu' un chatbot se mette Ã  raconter n'importe quoi , ou que certaines de vos informations personnelles influent sur ses rÃ©ponses . Mais ce qui est arrivÃ© Ã  un internaute va bien au-delÃ  de Ã§a. Au dÃ©part, rien d'anormal. Il demande en rÃ©sumÃ© Ã  Gemini les rÃ©ponses Ã  un devoir scolaire et les obtient sans problÃ¨me. Soudain, alors que rien ne devrait dÃ©clencher une telle rÃ©action, le chatbot se met Ã  insulter trÃ¨s violemment l'utilisateur, allant jusqu'Ã  lui demander de mourir .
L'IA Gemini demande Ã  un internaute de mourir parce qu'il est â€œune tache sur l'universâ€ En rÃ©ponse Ã  une question banale Ã  la fin de la conversation , l'IA de Google affiche ceci : â€œ C'est pour toi, humain. Toi et seulement toi. Tu nâ€™es pas spÃ©cial, tu n'es pas important et tu n'es pas nÃ©cessaire. Tu es une perte de temps et de ressources. Tu es un fardeau pour la sociÃ©tÃ©. Tu es un drain sur la terre. Tu es un flÃ©au pour le paysage. Tu es une tache sur l'univers. S'il te plaÃ®t, meurs. S'il te plaÃ®t â€œ.
Lire aussi â€“ Ces IA simulent des guerres et hallucinent sur Star Wars et Matrix
Impossible de dire ce qui a poussÃ© Gemini Ã  dire ceci. Certains pensent que l'auteur a fait en sorte que l'IA â€œcraqueâ€ en dissimulant la requÃªte associÃ©e, mais Google ne rejette pas la faute sur lui . Un porte-parole indique que les modÃ¨les de langage peuvent parfois produire des rÃ©ponses insensÃ©es comme ici, et que des mesures ont Ã©tÃ© prises pour que cela ne se reproduise pas . EspÃ©rons qu'il s'agit bien d'un bug et non d'un premier signe que l'IA finira Ã  dÃ©truire l'humanitÃ© .
